Package index

All functions

RG_to_igraph()
Converts a relationship graph (RG) encoded as a list to an igraph object
compute_posterior()
Compute posterior probabilities of P. vivax recurrence states
determine_MOIs()
Determine multiplicities of infection (MOIs)
enumerate_RGs()
Enumerate relationship graphs (RGs)
fs_VHX_BPD
Allele frequencies computed using example Plasmodium vivax data
plot_RG()
Plot a relationship graph (RG)
plot_data()
Plots the data
plot_simplex()
Plots a 2D simplex
project2D()
Project 3D probability coordinates onto 2D simplex coordinates
sample_RG()
Sample a relationship graph (RG)
ys_VHX_BPD
Example Plasmodium vivax data
